data_description.use_single_tag: Enable if you want to use the same tag for arming and disarming
data_description.arm_tag: The unique ID of your NFC tag (e.g., c44df694-639e-4608-a98d-35156be653b7)
data_description.disarm_tag: Only required if you want to use separate tags

data_description.enable_siren: Enable this option to play an audio file when alarm is triggered
data_description.media_player: Select the media player for siren output (e.g., Google Nest Hub, Sonos)
data_description.siren_file: Full path to the siren audio file (e.g., media-source://media_source/local/siren.mp3)

data_description.enable_notifications: Enable to receive push notifications on status changes
data_description.notify_service: Name of the notification service (e.g., notify.mobile_app_iphone)
data_description.enable_auto_disarm: Enable to automatically disarm the system daily
